Package org.example.GUI.mainGame

Class Hexagon

java.lang.Object
org.example.GUI.mainGame.Hexagon
public class Hexagon extends Object
Represents a hexagon on the game board.

    • Hexagon

      public Hexagon(int x, int y, int radius, String type, String effet)
      Constructor for Hexagon.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the hexagon.
      y - Y-coordinate of the hexagon.
      radius - Radius of the hexagon.
      type - Type of the hexagon.
      effet - Effect of the hexagon.

    • Hexagon

      public Hexagon(int x, int y, int radius, String type, String effet, int row, int col, Game game)
      Parameterized constructor for Hexagon.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the hexagon.
      y - Y-coordinate of the hexagon.
      radius - Radius of the hexagon.
      type - Type of the hexagon.
      effet - Effect of the hexagon.
      row - Row index of the hexagon.
      col - Column index of the hexagon.
      game - The game instance.

    • existsWhaleEffect

      public Player existsWhaleEffect()
      Checks if any player has the effect of defending against whale attacks.
      Returns:
      The player who has the whale defense effect, or null if none.

    • existsSharkEffect

      public Player existsSharkEffect()
      Checks if any player has the effect of defending against shark attacks.
      Returns:
      The player who has the shark defense effect, or null if none.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the state of the hexagon. - Handles effects like serpent, baleine, and requin. - Sets the possible exit direction for pawns based on the hexagon's position.

    • getAdjacentHexagons

      public List<Hexagon> getAdjacentHexagons(List<Hexagon> hexagons)
      Returns a list of hexagons that are adjacent to this hexagon.
      Parameters:
      hexagons - the list of all hexagons on the board
      Returns:
      a list of adjacent hexagons

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g)
      Draws the hexagon tile and its contents using the specified Graphics2D object.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics2D object to use for drawing

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the hexagon tile is empty (i.e., contains no boat, creature, or pawns).
      Returns:
      true if the hexagon tile is empty, false otherwise
